title: MMR?
body:
How is it calculated, for example i want to play with my friend who is 5 ranks below me (even though he is probably better than me, he just had some bad luck), if we lose will i lose more MMR than if i was playing on my own? the same goes for him, if we win will he gain more? or is it unaffected?

(i will be playing with him regardless, i just would like to know)

replies.body:
If you are playing ranked the system will match you with players of the higher skill level. If you have the higher MMR you will get normal LP gains.

Your friend will gain normal LP gains until his MMR is above his rank division rank. Which should be a couple wins at a higher level of play.

HOWEVER, you are also expected to win the game at different rates that effect your MMR's.

He is playing in higher level games, you are playing in lower level games and your MMR gain's and losses are modified as such.
